php.LBL_ADD_TYPE: Add type and protocol to address
php.LBL_PORT_CONNECT_IMAP: Port used to connect to IMAP
php.LBL_IP_ADDRESS: Check IP address of client while giving authorization
php.PLL_IDENTITY_0: many identities with possibility of editing all parameters
php.PLL_IDENTITY_1: many identities with possibility of editing all parameters, but not the email address
php.PLL_IDENTITY_2: one identity with possibility of editing all parameters
php.PLL_IDENTITY_3: one identity with possibility of editing all parameters, but not the email address
php.PLL_IDENTITY_4: one identity with possibility of editing only signature
